content: a waymaker provides a way means or solution despite difficulty or impossibility it one of the names given to god in the bible i don t know about you but there have been times in my life where i couldn t see past what was right in front of me i couldn t find a way but he did it s what he does while this cowl may take a bit of work on our part to knit the stitches provide a rhythm that allows us to relax and remember we don t have to have it all figured out if we would trust he will make a way even when we don t see one this pattern was created using a contrast color for the stripes but you can make it your own use mini skeins for the stripes hold fingering double for a marled look or make each section a new color the possibilities are endless use this pattern as a blank canvas and paint the masterpiece you are looking for
